1.content:
Mark Smith arrived at Sunnydale High with a diabolical master plan. He had, in his pocket, a shrink ray!

Of course, that wasn’t the plan. That was just the tool, a rather expensive tool at that, one in which he invested two years of his life plus a huge chunk of his parents’ fortune. He was so proud of it, he even sprang the extra cash to have it covered in gold. Otherwise, his ray would simply have looked like a TV remote control. But now it was golden!

Mark had one overriding thought in mind during these past two years. He would someday use his invention to shrink beautiful girls down to a size that would leave them entirely at his mercy. He couldn’t quite explain it, and didn’t care to, but he loved the notion of teeny tiny women.

His day had arrived. The invention was complete, and it was time to claim his first victim. He knew just the right girl, too.

Buffy Summers. Sure, she was a strange one, but damn, she was a hottie.

Mark strode down a hall full of lockers. The tardy bell was about to ring, so hardly anyone was around, except for a few preoccupied with rushing to their next class.

And, just as expected, among the punctual-challenged, there she was.

Buffy was digging deep into her locker, pulling out a couple of books and shoving them into the backpack at her feet. He could have zapped her right then and there. But no. He wanted to see the look on her face when she realized what was happening to her.

Mark walked right up to her. “Um, hi there, uh, Buffy,” he said, failing to sound as confident as he intended.

Buffy’s head popped up from her bag. “Huh? What?” She looked like she had been a million miles away.

But Mark didn’t care what she was thinking about. He only cared what he was thinking about, that this would be a glorious moment.

“Yes?” Buffy said with little patience, urging him to get to the point. She was running late, after all.

He liked that she was looking up at him. Soon, she’d be looking way up.

Mark smiled. “I--”

Then the bell rang. Buffy spun around to look at a clock.

To hell with it. It was now or never. Mark whipped out his golden shrink ray and fired it.

But a circuit blew, and the machine...
1.title: Buffy the target

11.content:
It backfired, engulfing Mark in a field of energy. After a split-second, the world became a whole lot bigger. To him, anyway. He now stood well short of an inch.

The first thing he saw was the back of Buffy’s shoes, but both looked more like buildings. He craned his neck back and looked up, up, up, and still up some more.

Buffy was no longer some ordinary high school girl. As far as Mark was concerned, she had become Buffy the Giant.

No, no, no! This wasn’t fair! He wasn’t the one who was supposed to become tiny! She was!

The huge shoe rose into the air as Buffy turned around. Her now-booming voice began, “Sorry, but I really need to--” The kid was gone, so she just shrugged and gave him not one more thought.

She did, however, notice the golden device on the floor, which is when Mark realized: his shrinking machine hadn’t shrunk with him.

“Ooh, shiny.” Buffy bent down to pick up the strange item. “Someone must really like their television,” she said, studying the bizarre remote control. “Or, maybe not anymore, or it wouldn’t be all lost-and-found-y.”

Though it was futile, Mark shouted up, “No, you big blonde bimbo! It’s not a remote! It’s a shrink ray! My shrink ray! Give it here!” He found it much easier to sound confident when he knew the relative giantess before him couldn’t possibly hear a word he said.

Buffy tossed the remote in her backpack. Mark needed to act fast.
11.title: Buffy the (sort of) Giant

111.content:
Buffy had put the shrink ray in a side pocket of her book bag, which remained on the floor, but only for another second or two, tops.

Mark sprinted toward that pocket, though he was huffing and puffing by the time he grabbed onto the fabric, just in the nick of time. He felt the floor drop out from beneath him as Buffy lifted the bag onto her back, unaware of her itsy bitsy passenger.

Through some minor miracle, despite the jolting and swaying resulting from the giant girl’s rapid travel, Mark made it to the top of the pocket. Now it was time to climb over and down, though he took a moment to catch his breath. He needed to do this carefully, as he didn’t want to drop onto any buttons.

But that’s when Buffy stopped short to look at a clock and realize just how late for class she was.

Mark toppled over the edge and plummeted into the book bag’s pocket. He landed on a rubbery button, which didn’t hurt nearly as much as he expected (the smaller they are, they lighter they fall, he figured).

However, he still had sufficient mass to depress the button. The tip of the shrink ray began to glow, and it...

1111.content:
The flash was one that Mark was all too familiar with, and he winced as the light expanded to encompass his entire world. Great. The device has hit Buffy, and everything she was carrying, in the same way that his clothes had shrunk with him, so too her bag would, and him inside it!

The device remained immune to its own effect, and there was a huge tearing as the shrinking bag exploded around it. Buffy's gasp of surprise was lost on the tiny Mark as he spiralled into the void. Buffy remained a giant to him, but now she herself was less than an inch tall, meaning that he was falling into a world of titans, massive beyond comprehension. He cursed his poor luck one more time, wondering what fate had in store for him...

112.content:
No! She would acknowledge him! She would recognise his superiority now, and in time would bow before him as their roles reversed!

Mark lunged forward, wrapping his arms as far around the toe-end of Buffy's right shoe as he could manage. With a firm grip, he would follow her along to her next stop, and from there retrieve his device and his dignity! His genius would be recognised!

Then Buffy started walking. A single swing of her foot and Mark was wetting himself in terror, such were the incredible speeds his tiny body was exposed to. Then an impact as she touched down again, rattling his skeleton within him, before the process began to repeat at a rapid rate.

His grip was slipping. He wasn't the fittest of bargain basement mad scientists, and even with the added handholds his puny scale made available he wasn't going to be able to cling to this foot for much longer. With no clue where in the world he was, he relaxed, let go, and allowed fate to take him...

12.content:
So, things didn’t entirely go according to plan, considering the fact that Buffy now appeared gigantic before Mark.

A giant Buffy Summers? Mark seethed. It wasn’t supposed to be this way! She was supposed to become a tiny Buffy Summers! He had waited so very long to see this hot girl shrunken down. To see her like this, all huge and with towering, tremendous girth...

Mark had one thought course through his hormone-addled brain: AHHHH!!!

Buffy spun around to face him, where he had been anyway. “Sorry, but I really need to...” Seeing no one, she shrugged and forgot all about that strange kid.

He was now the size he had intended for Buffy, roughly three inches high, give or take. Thanks to dumb luck, his shrink ray shrunk with him. If it hadn’t... But the smoke rising out of it didn’t inspire confidence. What could have gone so wrong?

Now wasn’t time to dwell. Buffy was leaning down to zip up her bag. Mark figured that with a little time, he could get his shrink ray working again. But did he want to stow away with Buffy so he could turn the tables as soon as possible? Or maybe he should find a quiet spot alone to work? Or, he wasn’t sure the machine was totally fried. He could try again to shrink Buffy.
12.title: Nooo!!!

122.content:
Mark watched as Buffy walked away -- all hundred or so feet of her.

“Buffy Summers, I will hold you in the palm of my hand before this day is through!” he vowed to the oblivious blonde giant. The moment moved him to attempt a maniacal laugh. Then his voice cracked.

Forget the maniacal laughter! Mark Smith had work to do.

He found a door to a classroom, and he was just small enough to squeeze himself through the crack at the bottom. The room was empty this period. Good. He could work in peace.

But his inspection of his invention yielded only one result: sparks. This thing was fried good. Where could he have gone wrong? He could have sworn his calculations were perfect.

He had to face facts. If he was going to get back to normal, he’d need help from someone smart. Two names came to mind: Willow Rosenberg and Miss Calendar.

It would be humiliating, having to seek help from women who must now tower over him. But once they did help him, he’d have a functioning shrink ray to repay them for that humiliation. That Willow may have been a wallflower, but she’d make a cute shrinkee. And a teensy Miss Calendar would be even better.

Tracking them down at his current size was going to pose challenges, however. He needed to decide which one to focus on finding first.
122.title: He must work!

choices: Mark calls up to Willow.
Buffy arrives.
The shrink ray starts sparking...
1222.content:
Mark decided to find Willow, figuring she’d be the more naïve option and therefore easier to manipulate.

He knew precisely where her locker was, on account of his excellent attention to detail. Well, he had excellent attention to detail when it come to the routines of cute girls he intended to eventually shrink.

The trip to Willow’s locker was quite a hike at his diminished size, but that was fine. He had plenty of time until the bell rang.

When he finally reached the monolithic locker, he realized he’d need some cover. Three inches tall wasn’t invisible. Kids with low self esteem might spot him.

Mark found a crumpled up piece of paper, which was still light enough for him to position against the base of Willow’s locker. He ducked behind it as the bell rang.

Soon, giant feet began clomping down the hallway, and they swiftly multiplied exponentially.

He gazed up at the giants -- particularly the giant girls. He took mental notes on which ones he wanted to shrink as soon as his machine was functional again. He noticed Cordelia and her entourage parading down the hall. They all needed to be shrunken down as soon as possible, especially Cordelia. The sight of her as a giant filled Mark with rage.

Cordelia’s enormity so angered Mark that he failed to notice the huge sneaker slamming right down in front of him, knocking him off his own little feet.

He turned his eyes upward, up an incredibly long pair of jeans and beyond to Willow’s adorably innocent face, way up the “sky.”

Mark had but one thought: Of all the days for her not to wear a skirt, geez...

He hated how big she was right then, but he reminded himself it was temporary. His fingers itched around his non-functioning shrink ray.

Mark figured he wasn’t too small to be audible, so...

"...in my locker."
12221.content:
“Willow!” Mark whispered up to relatively huge redhead.

Since he was actually tiny, he realized he needed to be louder.

“Willow!” he shouted. His voice sounded squeaky to him, but he pretended he was imagining it.

She was in the middle of pulling her locker open when she thought she heard her name. It almost sounded like a boy’s voice...an effeminate boy, but she was pretty sure it was a male voice. A glance around revealed no one. So she shrugged and continued gathering her books. Of course no guys wanted to talk to her. Not even the effeminate ones.

“Willow! I’m down here! Quickly!”

Down? She wondered if someone was playing a trick, but when she looked down, she spotted something moving right beside that paper ball. A tiny boy.

She sank to her knees and leaned down. Her normally large eyes now exceeded colossal.

“You’re a -- are you a teeny little boy? No offense or anything, but I’ve never met anyone so itty bitty. Is that offensive?”

Mark never felt more humiliated. Bad enough being stuck tiny, but to have anyone, even Willow, crouching over him and studying him...

He reminded himself to be nice.

Willow continued rambling nervously. “I don’t want to offend -- Hey, I know you! You’re in my computer class. You’re...What’s your name?”

“It’s Mark. Now I don’t want anyone else to see me like this. It’s my own fault. I invented a shrinking machine for a, um, a science project, and it malfunctioned and broke. You’re the only one I trust to help me get back to normal size. Can we talk? Alone?”

“Of course, but I have to get to class..."

Mark came up with a devilish idea. If he had to be tiny, he might as well figure out a way to enjoy it. “That’s fine, but is there somewhere you can put me where I’d be safe in the meantime?” He thought, like a pocket, or any article of clothing...

“Oh, yeah, sure! You can wait...”

124.content:
Mark found the entire situation unacceptable. A giant Buffy was not allowed.

Part of him knew he was taking a risk, but it was a part completely overridden by his id. Buffy must be tiny, dammit! Or else! Or else what? Or else nothing!

As Buffy lifted her titanic bag, her ankle was right there in front of Mark -- and a little above him. Even her ankle know presented a substantial target. Unacceptable.

Mark fired his shrink ray. This time, the ray did its proper job. The energy enveloped the entire enormity that was Buffy, and it squeezed her down to his size.

Then, the shrinking machine promptly exploded, either due to its already-established defects, or because Buffy was just too huge for it to handle. Mark decided to blame Buffy.

The now-tiny Buffy wondered what these massive structures around her were. She soon realized they were lockers.

"What the what now?" she said. "I'm...teeny?"

She turned around and found Mark. She marched toward him, not looking pleased. She may have been shrunk, but that only made her slightly shorter than Mark was. A moment ago, he could have easily hidden from her until he perfected his device. Now...

Perhaps Mark should have thought this situation through a tad better.

Mark had no idea what she was saying. The fact that she was talking to him had already overloaded his capacity for social interaction, so he just raised his hands defensively, smiling nervously.

"No, no wings... What, a goblin? One of Santa's elves? Give me something to work with here!"

Mark shrugged.

"Not a big talker? That's okay! Giles will know how to solve this problem."

Mark hadn't planned on resisting when she grabbed him by the shoulder and began to drag him away, but he'd been unprepared for just how strong she was.

The journey to the library would be fraught with danger for three-inch tall students...

This was not how Buffy wanted to start her day. Shrunk to teeny size by an unknown force? Yeah, it got her out of math, but math might actually have been better.

She dragged the little troublemaker toward the library when it started thundering. But there wasn’t a cloud in the sky when she arrived at school...

No, it wasn’t thunder. It was giants -- specifically, the entire cheerleading squad ambling down the hall, right toward them. They filled the hall, leaving no room for anyone to get around them. Front of center, naturally, was Cordelia.

“Of course,” Buffy muttered. “Who else would be the first humongoid giant I see?” She cheered herself up by imagining the heart attack Cordelia would have if she ever saw herself swollen to such massive proportions.

Buffy watched the titanic feet smash the floor, each one at a different time. Very un-choreographed for cheerleaders. But their pace was leisurely. She knew she could run that gauntlet and make it to the other side -- but could she do it while hanging onto what’s-his-name?

125.content:
Before he could make a move, Mark heard something. Voices. But not big, booming voices like Buffy’s now sounded. No, these voices were smaller, not to mention creepier.

“The slayer’s time grows short,” one said, soft and menacing.

“She will die,” another said, “at our hands.”

Mark turned around and found four robed, hooded men standing a few lockers down. They didn’t stand very tall, however. These were petite creatures, to put it gently, maybe a head taller than Mark. And speaking of heads...he couldn’t see theirs, just shadow inside their cloaks.

He wondered if he accidentally shrank them, too, but they barely seemed to notice him. They couldn’t stop staring at Buffy.

Mark wondered: What the hell is a slayer?

“The slayer will die,” one of the shadowy men said, apparently apathetic regarding his lack of height.

Then the four men held hands, and light blue electric energy charged around them.

Something wasn’t quite right there.

Mark looked up at Buffy, who was simply rushing off to class, completely unaware of her tiny stalkers and their little lightshow.

Wait...Was Buffy this slayer thing? Is that who they meant? A slayer of what exactly? Slayer of tiny shadowy men in robes?

“The slayer will die...soon,” one said, as they began marching forward.

Mark thought their plan a little harsh. He didn’t like the idea of killing anyone. Control them, make them helpless, take them prisoner, sure, he was all for that. But he didn’t want anyone dying, least of all a pretty girl like Buffy. That would just be sick.

He looked down at his malfunctioning shrink ray. When it shorted out, the battery got drained dry. He would need some kind of power source. And these little guys, whatever they were, apparently had a supply of their own. He could offer a trade, get them to all grow bigger than Buffy.

But could he really do that? What kind of man did he want to be?
125.title: Tiny demons

choices: Mark enlarges the demons.
Mark shrinks Cordelia.
The shrink ray breaks.
1251.content:
Mark wanted his height restored. Buffy would just have to take care of herself.

Gathering his wits, Mark approached the four cloaked men. “Um, hello,” he said, trying desperately to keep his voice from shaking.

They stopped and stared at him with their creepy blank faces.

He continued, “I, uh, couldn’t help but notice you, uh, have some unresolved issues with Buffy. With the slayer, I mean. I also couldn’t help but, um, notice...she’s a lot bigger than you.” He displayed his golden shrink ray. “This machine here can change the size of anything, usually. It’s out of juice right now, but you all seem to have your own supply. So I was thinking...”

The four men turned to each other and deliberated silently. They turned to Mark. “The bargain is struck,” one proclaimed.

They held their hands forward, channeling light blue electric energy from their hands to the shrink ray. It was over in seconds.

“Now,“ one said, “uphold your end of the bargain.”

Mark was just about to, until he heard footsteps. They were really loud footsteps, given how big the shoes must have been.

He looked up and saw Cordelia Chase approaching a water fountain nearby.

She towered even higher than Buffy had. She was now the giant she always seemed to think she was, or so she seemed from Mark’s disadvantaged perspective.

His shrink ray was fully charged, and it probably needed a test before he pulled it on himself. And if there was one girl who needed to be cut down to size, it was Cordelia Chase.

“Uphold your end of the bargain,” the cloaked man repeated.
1251.title: Bad guy team-up

choices: "...later."
12512.content:
Mark couldn’t resist. This opportunity was golden.

This time, nothing cute. He just pointed his ray at Cordelia’s over-sized but still lovely legs and fired.

And...it worked! Cordelia swiftly dwindled down to a size proportional to him.

But he got precisely one glorious second of watching her astonished reaction to her newly gigantic setting. Then, the shrink ray exploded. It didn’t merely short-circuit this time. It blew apart, into dozens of pieces.

Several curse words coursed through Mark’s brain. But being stuck small was the least of his troubles.

“You have dishonored the bargain,” the still-tiny cloaked guy said. “You will pay the price..."
12512.title: Cordelia cut down to size

choices: Cordelia seeks out Buffy.
Cordelia finds a place to hide.
125121.content:
Cordelia wondered where the water fountain went. One second, she was drinking from it. The next, it was gone.

No, it wasn’t gone, she realized. The floor and wall looked different. She had been transported somewhere else!

But then she looked up, and she realized that conclusion, too, was wrong.

She found the water fountain, stretching high into the air. She pivoted and discovered the lockers had similarly grown. Something had turned Sunnydale High into a giant Sunnydale High!

Or...she hated to consider the possibility...did something turn her into a tiny Cordelia Chase?

At the base of the lockers, she spotted four cloaked men and a geeky boy. They were all about her size.

The cloaked men reached forward and grabbed the boy. Blue energy crackled, channeling from them to him, and the boy screamed. Then, he was vaporized. Nothing left remained.

Cordelia screamed, and the four cloaked men turned to her. Clearly, they were the ones who shrank her, just like they shrank what’s-his-name. And if they thought he was worth killing, surely she would be next. She was so much more important than...that guy.

She hated to admit it, but she needed Buffy. Fortunately, Buffy was in her class this period. She had just seen her a minute ago. She was still normal-sized, probably, but either way, the slayer could take these creeps who must have been really ugly if they needed to wear those hideous cloaks. Cordelia just had to get back to the classroom, which was right around the corner.

The thing was, now that she was three inches tall, that corner seemed a lot further away. And the ugly cloaked guys weren't so far away.
125121.title: Big new world

choices: Cordelia hides in Buffy's backpack.
Buffy drops her pen.
1251211.content:
Cordelia ran to the classroom. It took a while, on account of her much shorter legs, but she eventually reached the doorframe, at which point she needed to stop and catch her breath.

She looked back, and those little demons were nowhere to be seen. If they were following her, at least they were slow about it.

She ventured into the classroom and had to stop again, as she momentarily lost her breath for an entirely different reason. Her classmates were just so HUGE.

Cordelia cringed. Giant size was not flattering on anyone. They all seemed so bloated. Ew.

And their shoes! She hadn’t noticed before, but most kids had terrible taste in footwear. Some of the sneakers looked like they had been handed down through the generations. All her hard work in setting a positive example was apparently lost on these losers.

But she wasn’t there to evaluate shoes. She was there to get help growing back big enough so she’d never again have to look straight ahead at any of these garish feet.

Carefully, she maneuvered between desks, as she kept looking up to make sure no one was looking down. She may have been tiny, but she wasn’t invisible. She could not let anyone see her like this, except Buffy, because despite everything, Buffy was still the bigger freak. Much bigger.

Cordelia found Buffy seated in her desk, tapping a pen as she stared blankly at her textbook. She seemed like she was a million miles away.

It was weird that Buffy looked so large, like she was at least one-hundred feet tall. It would be even weirder when Cordelia figured out a way to get her attention.

So exactly would she do that? There was no way in hell she was climbing up that gigantic desk.

12512112.content:
Cordelia couldn't suppress her squeal as the tree landed in front of her, missing her by inches.

When she'd recovered, she hurridly looked around, to ensure that no one had noticed her display; such girlish displays were best used in a controlled environment, to encourage some college boy to comfort her, not to look pathetic in front of the masses.

Of course, no one had heard the sound made by a three-inch girl.

A few deep breaths later, Cordelia checked out the tree. It was very smooth, and bright yellow, one end tapering to a point...

Buffy's fingers (how had she never noticed how fat they were? Cordelia asked herself) snatched up the pencil almost casually, no doubt with that freakish Slayer-strength or whatever. Petulantly, Cordelia placed her hands on her hips and stared upwards. How dare she not acknowledge her?

Buffy eyes, on that face so far above, blinked once. "Great. First a living ventriloquist's dummy, now living Barbie dolls. I almost miss the vampires..."

Cordelia had no time to splutter in indignation as Buffy acted.

Buffy apologizes and lets Cordy stew in her bag.
125121121.content:
Buffy was surprised she wasn’t more surprised. A living doll should have been shocking. It should have ruined many a childhood memory.

But to her, it was simply another inconvenience intruding on her day, something she’d have to check out. Can’t have little doll people running around on the loose, right? At the very least, she needed to make sure this wasn’t a homicidal doll person.

She snatched up Barbie girl, intending to stuff her in her bag until she had a moment to chat with her in private. She stopped, however, when she realized shorty here felt warm and soft. Apparently, this “doll” wasn’t made of plastic.

Buffy glanced at the palm of her hand and recognized Cordelia.

The mighty Cordelia Chase, shrunken down to a few inches high.

Buffy burst out laughing. Everyone turned to her.
125121121.title: Snatched

choices: Mister Goodyear disciplines Buffy
The tiny demons put in an appearance
1251211212.content:
"Miss Summers,do you find something amusing about the erection of the Berlin Wall?"

Buffy was about to respond to Mister Goodyear when the rest of the class joined in laughing. The teacher jerked his head from side to side, clearly unaware why his statement was being met with such humour. Soon, Buffy knew, that confusion would lead to some need to reassert himself, and she sure wasn't going to be scapegoat for that.

"Sorry," she said, smiling awkwardly while bringing Cordelia to her lap, hidden by the desk. "I guess I just like the idea of, uh, the people of Berlin being united by a building project. Kinda heartwarming after the war, right?"

Now the laughter was at her expense, but Buffy was concentrating more on Cordelia, squirming in her palm. The little girl was wriggling far too much - into the bag she went. She'd be safe in there, with all the stakes.
1251211212.title: No Laughing Matter

choices: Mark stands on the remote
Mark hides in Buffy's bag
Mark heads to a classroom
Mark heads to the principal's office
Mark heads outside
13.content:
The golden remote thudded to the ground before Mark, sparks shooting from it like lightning, causing the boy to flinch back from it. That was a lot of energy for so small a device! But then... The handheld remote was the size of a pickup before him.

Gritting his teeth, Mark looked up at where Buffy stood, her legs now climbing high out of his line of vision. That stupid device had gone and malfunctioned on him! He never should have taken construction tips from that hooded stranger!

Calm, he told himself. Anger wouldn't get him out of this situation. He may have shrunk himself to - quick mental calculation - three inches high, but at least the corridors were empty. There was only Buffy and she filled his world.

The girl stood relatively stationary as she loaded her bag, yet even her slightest movments were awe inspiring, clearly containing power far beyond the imaginings of tiny Mark. All he'd have to do was gain her attention, get her to utilise his device to restore him, and he'd be free to plan anew! If he was quick enough, he could wrest the control from her and cut her down to size before she realised what was going on, and the day could still be salvaged!

Greedy thoughts flickering through his mind, Mark cleared his throat. His announcement was thoroughly drowned out by the arrival of another girl.

She pounded down the hallway, the impacts of her massive, booted feet shuddering the world. Her greeting was bellowed, and as the two girls conferred, Mark was awestruck, watching the two huge forms with his jaw slack. Buffy may not have been one of the 'popular' girls at school, but she had always dressed as if she were, her clothes revealing ample amounts of tanned skin and her hair dyed blonde. The newcomer - and how had he never seen her around the school before? He would have remembered - was nquite different, pale of skin and dark haired, her clothes tough and no nonsense, her gestures and expressions far more masculine. She had attitude. He would love to shrink hr down, hold the angry young woman in his hand, and teach her who was truly in charge...

"Word, B," she said, slapping a hand to Buffy's shoulder. "You ready to go?"

"Not now, Faith. If I miss one more class, I'm going to be in trouble."

"Trouble? Girl, we're in trouble every night of our lives, and with things a little bit more scary than being sent to the prinicipal's office."

Mark managed to eventually train himself to block out the sound of their voices, allowing it to become a dull thunder far above his head and preventing it from distracting him. He had no time to eavesdrop!

Faith's huge boot shifted, planting itself directly parallel and alongside the remote. If she'd seen it, she gave no sign, but it souldn't be too long before she did. Mark could climb his invention and get the attention of these two girls from there. Once restored, he could add them to his collection!

Of course, their current plans seemed less than accommodating to helping him. This 'Faith' was a bad influence. Buffy had yet to lift her bag from the gorund, and the barn-sized accessory was all too inviting a hiding place. Mark could snuggle up in there until he had a better moment to strike.

Of course, perhaps trying to get either of these airheads to help was a complete waste of time; Mark had always felt that girls were beneath him, and how could they possibly accrue the brainpower to solve his problem? No, perhaps he'd be better off leaving them to their hooky and setting off in search of someone with a mind worth mentioning. If he did that though, where would be best to look? A classroom, the principal's office, or perhaps even off school grounds? Each would be quite a trek...
13.title: Temptation to Truancy

choices: Mark does whatever she asks.
Mark demands she restores him now.
Mark begs Faith not to hurt him.
131.content:
Laziness got the better of Mark. The closest classroom was quite a hike away, so best to stick with getting the attention of this Faith girl. She’d be easy enough to fool, he figured, if he got her attention in time.

Buffy was already leaving, having decided to do the responsible thing and head to class. Faith stood her ground and teased her as the blonde walked away, but she didn’t look like the type to loiter in school hallways for too long.

Mark hustled onto the shrink ray, right as Faith’s boot accidentally struck it, sending it spinning in place. It was a dizzying experience, and right when the world began to settle down, he looked up and saw the giant hot girl crouching over him, leering.

“Well, well, this is interesting,” Faith said, reaching down, pinching her fingers onto the back of Mark’s shirt, and carelessly dropping him onto her palm.

Normally, Mark would be thrilled that a hot girl found him interesting, but not when she appeared to be over a hundred feet tall.

Faith bounced him in her hand. Mark felt his soft ground disappear and reappear a few times, as gravitational forces made him nauseous. He regretted that he screamed. It made her laugh. Mark wanted to tell her to be careful, but that colossal, all-consuming face looked far too intimidating to order around. Those were eyes he could not resist.

Faith held the golden remote in her other hand. “Wild guess here, but I’m gonna go ahead and say this is a shrink ray. Is this your shrink ray thing, little dude?”

Mark nodded.

“Great. You’re going to show me how to work this, and I’m going to have some fun."
131.title: Trying to reach Faith

choices: Mark instructs Faith falsely, hoping for her to shrink herself
Mark tells Faith how to operate the machine correctly
Mark flexes his completely undeveloped seduction muscles
1311.content:
"Your wish is my command," Mark said, bowing. "Think of me as your personal genie."

"Sweet," Faith said, bringing her face closer and licking her lips. "And if this all goes well, maybe we can have a little fun together? See what that little bod of yours is capable of..."

At that, Mark had to fight to keep his face straight, to avoid throwing up, almost. The idea of a tiny person and a giant... interacting had of course been in his mind before, but he'd always wished himself to the bigger of the pair in that situation. What Faith was suggesting... For him to be the lesser party, in thrall to the desires of the other? Disgusting.

"But that's for later. First things first, what button I gotta push to shrink... that locker?" Faith raised the remote and lazily arced it across the room before settling upon a target.

The events of a few moments ago ran before Mark's eyes. He saw where he had gone wrong before, and knew how he could avoid backfire in the future. But did he want to spare Faith that? If he could get her to shrink herself, that would put one of his problems out of sight!

Of course, he needed a regular-sized patsy to activate the device, so perhaps he'd better play along for now, earn her trust. Seeing her shrink a few inanimate objects was hardly a crushing burden.

No, the crushing burden would come when Faith decided to give in to her erotic desire toward him... If he could only avoid that somehow! Maybe... Perhaps, if he really laid the charm on thick, he could convicne her to restore him for some full-size sex! Prior to him shirnking her down to doll-size, of course. The problme with that scheme was the incredible lack of skill with girls that led to Mark wanting to make toys of them...
1311.title: Willing Slave

choices: Mark tries to restore Faith.
Someone else arrives.
13111.content:
Mark could not resist any opportunity to make a girl smaller. The device, in its currently flawed configuration, was going to shrink anyone who tried to shrink anyone or anything else. The fix was simple, so simple even this Faith could manage it, if Mark had chosen to relay the instructions.

“The machine requires two hands to operate properly,” Mark said.

“This little thing?”

“The, uh, buttons are stiff.”

“I’m stronger than I look.”

“There’s a kickback. Like with a rifle.”

“Your ears so small you’re deaf now? I said I’m strong. I can handle this dinky little toy.”

“Just put me down!” Mark felt emasculated saying it. He always wanted a girl to say that to him.

“Whatever,” Faith said, dropping him a few inches above the hard school floor. Mark nearly sprained an ankle upon landing. “You better watch my step, little dude. Now what do I press?” She leaned down to hear him.

“The silver button in the center. Aim the remote, press that, and the target will shrink to a size proportional to mine.”

“Got it.”

Faith stood up and pointed the device at the lockers. She pressed the button, and the beam engulfed her, compressing her to a mere few inches in height. The remote again crashed onto the floor, still full-sized.

She adjusted to her new situation faster than Mark had expected. Before he knew it, Faith’s hands were around his neck, and she hoisted him off the ground. She truly was stronger than she looked.

“You little turd!” she snarled. “You better make me big again right now!”

Her command would’ve been porn to Mark’s ears, if not for the matter of his diminishing oxygen supply.
13111.title: Less Faith

choices: Faith grabs the device first
Mark grabs the device first
131111.content:
With such little air available to him, and what sounded like his neck bones creaking, Mark was under no illusion of who was in charge here. He had thought that he could overpower a Faith at his size, but if she was this freakishly strong, then she remaine din control, regardless of size.

It just wasn't his day.

With a mixture of gesture and gurgling, he managed to indicate to the girl that he would help her, and once more she dropped him to the ground. Then she kicked him, actually succeeding in sliding him across the school hall toward the device. "Go on then," she said, "fix it. And fix me while you're at it."

Oh yes, he'd fix it all right! Then, when he was restored, he'd have her as a plaything, just as he'd wanted!

He was hefted to his feet by Faith's arm. "We're sticking close, though; don't want you growing anywhere without me, now."

Fine, fine, he though to himself. At least he'd be normal size again.

It was a hairy few minutes as Mark worked over the intricate mechanisms of his masterpiece, impeded by his injuries, his diminished size and Faith's insistence on remaining in physical contact at all times. It was a good thing that everyone was in class, or they'd have been spotted for sure.

Eventually though, the machine was fixed, and a swift punch from Faith - her other hand holding tightly to Mark's shoulder - enveloped the pair in light that brought them back to their original heights. They each smiled, catching the other's gaze and stopping awkwardly. Then they remembered the device, now so tiny and retsing at their feet.
131111.title: Under Duress

choices: Mark waits to see what Faith will do
Mark shouts for help
Mark tries to make himself useful
1312.content:
"No," Mark corrected her, "you're going to restore me to normal and then return to me my property."

"Huh," Faith said, looking to one side, brow furrowed and lips pursed. "I guess being shrunk messes with your ability to understand English. Maybe if I repeated myself louder..."

Mark's platform tilted beneath him, and once again he had a sensation of freefall. This one lasted only a moment, before the fingers of Faith's hand curled around him, a fist holding him prisoner. They squeezed ever so gently, and he was all too aware how easy it would be for her to crush him in her grip.

Then that fist roared closer to that massive face, confusion replaced with determination. Faith snarled when she spoke, spittle spraying from between gleaming teeth to splatter on Mark's face. "You. Are going. To show me. How to work this. I. Am going. To have some fun."

Then he was directly before that mouth, its dripping, humid interior darkening his immediate future. "Understand?"

"P-perfectly. Oh yes, I understand, all right." But don't think that I'll forget this, once the tables have turned. "If you could just, uh, loosen your hold a little, I'll get on with your lesson..."

Faith pulled back enough that he could see her roll her eyes. "Geez. Okay. How's that?"

It was a little better, but still there wasn't enough room to pop free. It looked like Mark would have to play her game a little longer. "It'll do, I suppose. Good to see that you can understand simple instructions!"

Faith's eyes narrowed, her teeth ground together.

"...Because that's all you need to operate my shrink ray! Haha! Yes, now if you merely point it at the thing that you want to reduce in mass..."

She casually hefted the gigantic machine in her other hand, as if it weighed nothing. She spun it around, pointing this way and that until it came to rest facing a fire extinguisher. he told her which button to press, and the object vanished from sight, a gentle tinkling hinting at where it had fallen to the ground at Faith's feet, outside Mark's line of sight.

"Now, to undo such shrinkage -"

Faith turned her head to look at him again, and Mark could see the deranged glee on her face, and feel the hot air gusting from her heavy breathing. "Why would I want to do that?"

Oh dear. Mark would have to think fast to get his way out of this situation...
1312.title: Faith in a Higher Power

choices: "Could this make normal-sized things bigger than they were?"
"So, I guess I don't need you anymore, do I?"
13123.content:
Mark absolutely did NOT like where this was going. He had to keep Faith somewhat manageable for the moment. While he'd initially had thoughts of turning the tables on her, a few more moments in her demented grasp had altered his priorities a bit. Revenge would be nice, but he'd count it a victory if he could just survive.

"Because accidents happen," he managed without betraying his internal panic. "I mean, look at me, right?"

Faith seemed to consider this a moment, her manic glee replaced with a momentary thoughtfulness. "Fine, ant-man. How do I undo it?"

"You just have to reverse the polarity of the neutron flow-"

"In. English," she sneered, tightening her grip slightly. Mark reflexively let out a yelp.

"The polarity switch is on the left side! Switch it to 'positive' to restore something to its original mass!"

Faith turned the machine over in her other hand, observing the switch he'd spoken of. "This switch here?"

Mark nodded eagerly. "Yes! And if you'd be so kind, I'd like to provide myself as a test subject."

Faith didn't seem to hear him at all, as she asked her next question.
13123.title: Perhaps a Bit Too Useful

choices: The extinguisher grows in size
The device cannot make things grow bigger
131231.content:
Mark's first response was 'why would anyone want to do that?', and he was embarrassed never to have even pondered the possibility. He'd been obsessed with tiny women, but had never been open-minded enough to think of growing himself to make ALL women small!

And this Faith had cut straight to that possibility.

"I.. I don't know," he answered honestly. "To be honest, the device hasn't been fully field-tested..."

"Well, I'm not as dumb as you, so I won't volunteer myself as the guinea pig," Faith said, aiming the device at a nearby fire extinguisher.

"Boom time."
131231.title: Experimentation

choices: Faith wants to be big. Now.
The noise attracts attention, and Faith changes her plans.
1312311.content:
A small hum emerged from the device as it fired a small beam of light directly at the fire extinguisher. Faith waited, tapping her foot impatiently. For a moment, nothing happened. Then, a small crack began to appear up the wall the extinguisher was mounted against, as the safety equipment began to pulse outwards, growing larger and heavier by the second. It fell to the ground with a mighty "clang", still expanding.

All told, the fire extinguisher was slightly taller than Faith herself, almost six feet from top to bottom. The rogue slayer smiled darkly.

"Well. That's pretty damn promising, dontcha' think?"

Mark shivered in fear at the implications.
1312311.title: Successful Field Test

choices: Mark digs through the rubble
Mark looks for normal-sized help
13123111.content:
"So, let's see what this baby can truly do," Faith smiled, cranking the setting up a little before pointing it at herself and activating it. Mark was already running by the time he heard the explosive expansion, cursing himself for not coming up with such a plan himself. Of course, the remote would not grow with its user, so Faith would be stuck at whatever height she had chosen for herself until she found someone to help her.

Not that that would help Mark, stuck at his three inch height! Fuming, he turned to see how growing had worked out for Faith,hoping that she'd managed to knock herself out on the ceiling or something. Serve her right.

But no, all he could really see was her boot, occupying his entire line of sight and obscured only slightly by the slowly descending curtain of plaster and assorted debris. He had no clue how big she'd made herself, but in comparison he was no more than a speck.

Then the foot moved, wrenching more of the school building apart and shadowing his world entirely before it crunched down incalculably distant. There weren't any screams yet - but there would be soon, he was sure.

Somewhere in the wreckage vacated by the giant was the remote, the only means of diminishing her again and - more importantly - getting Mark back to actual size. He'd have to dig through to see if it was salvageable.

Of course, he wouldn't be able to operate it without aid, so perhaps he'd be better off finding an able-bodied assistant first? If he could find someone not panicking about the ensuing rampage...
13123111.title: Growing Faith

choices: Mark spies on the Scoobies for a while
Mark announces himself and points out the remote
131231112.content:
Not willing to risk his own life just yet, Mark backed off from the worst of the collapse, and waited for the first person to come running.

He didn't have to wait long.

Sprinting down the corridor came none other than Buffy, effortlessly covering the distance down the corridor in a time that would have left any number of athletes out of breath. But as she came to a halt mere inches from Mark's position, she showed no sign of exertion. Was she strong like Faith, Mark wondered?

He craned his head as he walked closer to get her attention, but she was doing the same, gazing up at the hole Faith's footstep had wreaked. He waved his arms futilely, but she remained indifferent.

Mark dodged back as others came running, slower and clumsier than the majestic Buffy. He recognised the childish form of Willow, smartest girl in school, and the slovenly mess that was Xander Harris. And was that the school librarian following behind?

"It's Faith," Buffy announced to the small crew, turning to address them and giving Mark cause to leap aside, lest her pretty little feet crush him. "Somehow she's gone Godzilla on us."

"Good lord," stammered the librarian - Giles, was it? "I've never heard of a phenomenon like this, of any magicks capable of such change..."

No, you wouldn't have! Mark thought to himself. Only my own genius can devise such a thing! But wait, why was he talking about magic, anyway? This was very strange indeed... Strange enough that Mark was tempted to keep quiet, see what theories this gang came up with, and not just announce himself straight away.
131231112.title: It Would Have To Be Buffy, Wouldn't It?

choices: Mark asks to be restored
Mark suggests that Buffy be shrunk
Mark advises some tests outside
1313.content:
"Hurt you? Dude, I'm the one that protects you form the monsters. See, I'm the Slayer."

Mark blinked. "You're... in a band?"

"No, I kill vampires. Wood, heart, dust." Faith mimed the dust sprinkling into the air with the fingers of her free hand after they 'exploded' from the heart fist. Off Mark's continued blank look, she shrugged. "Whatever. Point is, I'm not gonna squish ya. We're just gonna see a few sights, shrink a few things, have a few laughs." She smiled brightly, and if Mark had one weakness (besides not quite understanding which direction to point a shrink ray before firing) it was that he couldn't say no to a smiling woman.

Moments before, she had been a snarling, taunting monster bouncing him in her palm. But with a simple curve of her lips she had become a demure saint, incapable of harming him. So yes, he'd play along with her. In return, she'd no doubt restore him, and then he'd be able to imprison her as a living doll for the rest of her life.

Mark hadn't gotten the hang of gratitude.

"Fine, the uh, the shrink ray works just like a remote - point and click. The settings should be pretty self-explanatory. Of particular importance is the 'undo' button, which could come in handy if you want to unshrink something that you accidently, uh, shrunk."

"Good thing no one's doing anything like that," Faith smiled, rolling him around in her palm a little.

She had all the power, Mark was starting to realise. He'd have to make a suggestion quick, to assert some direction over the situation. Opening with a request for normalcy was a risk, but if he pulled it off he'd be home clear, overpowering her to get his property back.

A slower road to returning to his original plan would be to get Faith to shrink Buffy before she got too far away - that way, she'd have no choice but to cut class with her giant captor! It would save Mark some time later.

The slowest approach would be to take things outside, and run through agruelling process of tests, having Faith test each of the device's settings on inanimate objects. Mark already had performed enough tests, but he wanted his accomplice at least slightly trained before he let her go off and do her own thing.
1313.title: Be Gentle

choices: Shrink Buffy alone, send Mark in to 'collect' her
Shrink everyone in the room, and take time collecting them
13132.content:
"I saw you talking with that other girl," Mark said, affecting nonchalance, "the blonde one, Buffy? She wouldn't agree to go with you, did she? I bet she'd be a bit more cooperative if you cut her down to size..."

Faith's expression changed before his eyes, her angelic smile turning into a cruel sneer as the wheels turned in her brain. "That's not a bad idea, squirt. Never did have a Barbie doll when I was a kid."

Her fingers curled more around him, not quite forming a fist but certainly serving to keep Mark from sight as well as prevent him possibly falling. She strode off through the school and Mark grinned at how easily she'd gone along with his scheme. This 'slayer' may be strong, but she wasn't much for smarts; in time he'd be able to outwit and get the better of her, of this he was certain.

Faith peeled through the window of several classrooms before she found Buffy's, the girl paying rapt attention to the teacher alongside her comrades. She could bust in there and shrink her fellow Slayer, but then there'd be a whole room full of people wondering what was going on. The other route she could go for would be taking out the whole room of students, but keeping track of so many little rascals would be a whole other problem. Raising an eyebrow, she looked down at the geek in her palm.

"Hey, shorty, how many new friends you want?"
13132.title: A Mutual Enemy

choices: Mark suggests that Faith retsore him to help
Mark waits for Faith to make her move
131322.content:
Well, his plan was going up in smoke anyway, so what did Mark have to lose by blowing any cover he may have had? Plus, if he had a whole gaggle of tiny little boys and girls at Faith's feet, she may be more tempted to re-size him so that he could help her collect them! Wow, sometimes he impressed himself with how smart he was!

"Just zap 'em all," he breezily suggested, as casually as he was able while ensnared in the slayer's mighty mitt. "Then there'll be no-one to stop you doing just as you please!"

"Alright," Faith smiled, nodding and scanning the packed classroom. "I can see you're gonna be fun to keep around."

And useful too, Mark hoped.

Not big on subtlety, Faith smashed the window glass out with her elbow, and so the class were mainly staring directly down the barrel of the shrink-ray when it went off, wide-beam setting catching every person inside, as well as every piece of furniture. Buffy herself had time to let out a startled "Faith?" before she was swept along with her fellows to the dainty depths.

Faith climbed in through the window, casually smashing out more shards of glass. Squeals erupted from below at the deadly blades raining down on the students, and mark felt a thrill of power; he may be small as well, but he was way up here, looking down on his peers, as it should be!

Then Faith's first boot smashed down on the hardboard floor, and the tiny creatures before her panicked, running too and fro. Too bad for them the door was closed, leaving no way out. Once Faith had fully climbed inside, she inspected those assembled before her, wondering what her first words should be to the masses. Somethin' impressive, to show 'em who's boss now.

For his part, Mark was wondering if it was time to suggest he join Faith in regular scale. The thought of so many shrunken women so close was driving him wild, and he couldn't restrain himself much longer! Of course, perhaps he shouldn't push Faith too far, and he should hand tight in her grip and wait for her to suggest it herself...
131322.title: Too Many Tinies

choices: Follow tiny Buffy.
Follow tiny Mark.
1313222.content:
Most of the shrunken class fled to the far side of classroom, away from the seemingly enormous girl responsible for their unexpected shrinkage. But one little blonde girl marched toward the giant -- Buffy.

"Faith! What did you do to us?" she shouted up.

Faith howled with laughter. "Oh, my God, B! Your voice is like all chipmunk."

"This isn't funny! You need to fix this...now."

Even from his distant vantage point, Mark could see Buffy's firm, no-nonsense expression. She was used to taking charge of things. Some time at three inches tall would be good for her.

His stomach nearly jumped out his throat as Faith dropped into a squat to better address her...friend? Rival? Nemesis? Whatever they were to each other.

"Oh, I need to fix this? Try making me."

"Faith, I don't care how tiny I am, I will kick your giant ass until you--"

Faith was now rolling on the floor with laughter. Mark came closer to vomiting than he cared to admit, but she kept him reasonably secure in her lightly closed hand.

"Say--" Faith struggled to get herself under control. "Say that again, B."

Buffy was as defiant as ever. "I. Will. Kick. Your--"

"HA!" Faith set Mark on the floor. "Sorry, squirt. She's kind of a handful." And she didn't dare set the shrink ray down for even a second.

Faith plucked Buffy off the floor and rose to her feet. The tiny blonde squirmed, which only heightened Faith's already prodigious amusement at the whole situation.

Faith strode across the room to the window. She didn't step on anyone along the way, but rather than carefully navigate around them, she allowed them to dodge her footfalls.

"At your size, you're like Buffy the Mosquito Slayer now. I've given you one hell of a future in pest control. Think of the possibilities, B! Time for you to practice. You're all about practice, practice, practice, right?"

She opened the window, leaned out, and deposited Buffy onto the vast grassy field outside.

Mark, meanwhile, realized that his fellow shrunken students were approaching him...and they did not look happy.
1313222.title: Buffy the Mosquito Slayer

choices: Buffy frolics in the sunlit field
Buffy runs off to get help
13132221.content:
Buffy sprang to her feet with ease, perhaps quicker than usual with so much less weight to carry. A little extreme on the diet front...

The grass around her was neatly trimmed, being the sports field for the school. That meant it was only as deep as the tiny Slayer's knees. In the distance, beneath the eager Californian sun, distant behemoths did a little sporting. Above the stifled sound of Faith attempting to repress a giggle at her express.

Buffy wasn't going to let it get to her. She'd lost her temper a little inside, but it was a traumatic experience. Anyone else would have acted the same in that situation! Let Giles tut at her 'lack of restraint' as if he'd keep his upper lip all stiff if this happened to him!

She unclenched her fists and pondered the next move.

Faith was watching everything she did from on high, and wouldn't let any real harm come to her. This was just her idea of a joke, right? She was taking it a little far, but she wouldn't let anything happen. Perhaps Buffy should just take a little time out to get some exercise, enjoy this excuse to escape from the classroom for a little while! Faith would restore her, they'd laugh about it afterwards...

Or was something more sinister at hand? This was a little on the extreme side, even for Faith; maybe Buffy should run away, and try and get help from someone else. How far would it be to the library, at this size..?
13132221.title: She's Beaten Bigger Than This Before

choices: They trust Mark to provide a distraction
They go with the footballer's suggestion to go now
13132222.content:
Faith continued to watch Buffy struggle outside the window, so Mark took advantage of his no-doubt-momentary freedom to address his new peers.

"Fellow students!" he announced, raising his arms. "No doubt you're all wondering -"

"Shut up," came an ungrateful reply, from one of the football team. Mark didn't know his name - never on speaking terms with the jocks, was he - but the guy's burly physique was hardly lessened by being a little over three inches tall. "You came in here with her, so you're working together! You're going nowhere until you undo this!"

Mark raised his hands to placate a hostile crowd, but they grabbed his limbs and pinned them behind his back. "I'm as much a victim as all of you! But yes, I can explain how this happened to us! A little less pressure on the grabbing, please?"

A nod from their leader and Mark could again feel his arms, although he remained unable to move them. Once again he'd have to devote a tiny part of his considerable intellect to outwitting these inferiors.

"See that thing she's got in her hand? It's a shrink ray. We get that off her, we can all get back to normal. Now, if you release me, I can talk with her, distract her while the rest of you get it away from her. Sound fair?"

"I don't trust you," the footballer sneered. "I say we leave you here, and we go get that 'shrink ray' now, while she's already distracted!"

Mark watched the faces of his fellow students, wondering which side they'd take in this conflict...
13132222.title: An Innocent Victim Like You

choices: Mark tries to restore Buffy to normal.
Mark tries to shrink Buffy to tiny size.
The shrink ray explodes.
Someone else sees giant Buffy
They face a paranormal interruption.
14.content:
The shrink ray blew a circuit as a beam of emerald light bathed Buffy. Mark couldn’t stand the wait. Just another second, and Buffy would be...

...a 15-foot giant? What?

Somehow, the shrink ray backfired, and its target nearly tripled in size. Buffy shot up, up, and her head smacked the ceiling.

“Ow!” she said, briefly unaware of what hit her -- or rather, what she hit.

Then she looked around at her much smaller surroundings. “No way...” she said, awestruck. “Am I...Did I just pull an Alice?”

She remembered the awkward boy, and she found him down there, looking like a small child -- even more so than before. He was holding something golden, a small machine.

She reached down and hoisted Mark up to her level. He couldn’t believe how effortlessly she did so. Of course, he’d expect someone of her size to be strong, but he must have seemed hardly more than a feather to her.

“Hi,” she said. “You wanted to talk. Let’s talk. Now talk.”

“I--I didn’t mean for this to happen,” Mark said, quite honestly. “You were supposed to--”

“Go on. I’m listening. Not very patiently, but I’m listening.”

“The ray was supposed to, uh, shrink you.”

Her incredulous expression was unmistakable on her triple-sized face. “Shrink me? Do I look like I need to be shrunk?“ She corrected herself. “Did I look like I needed to be shrunk?”

Yes, Mark thought, but he didn’t dare say it. “I’m sorry! I’m sorry!”

“Just make me small again,” Buffy said. “But not too small.”

“I don’t know if I can! The ray--”

“Try, tiny. Last thing my reputation needs is the biggest butt in school."
14.title: Buffy the 15-foot giant

144.content:
Buffy set Mark on the floor. Leaning down, she said in a mild threatening tone, “Get shrinking, shorty.”

But then she looked beyond Mark and saw...Principal Snyder.

The weaselly little man looked even littler than usual, and many times more flabbergasted. “Summers...” he muttered in a snarl.

“Um, I can explain,” Buffy said, right before Mark bolted down the hall as fast as possible. “And there goes my explanation.”

Snyder regained his composure. “There’s only one explanation for this,” he said. “Drugs.”

“Drugs? What? No. A shrink ray, the little nerd built a--”

Snyder put his foot down. “Summers. My office. Now.”

“I’m not sure I can fit--”

“Now."

15.content:
A strange energy coursed through Mark. That didn’t feel promising.

His eyes cleared, and he found himself gazing up at a giant Buffy Summers. She was absolutely colossal. No way would she fit in his palm now. It infuriated him.

But Mark knew -- she technically wasn’t a giant. He was actually tiny.

Mark had one thought course through his hormone-addled brain: AHHHH!!!

Buffy spun around to face him, where he had been anyway. “Sorry, but I really need to...” Seeing no one, she shrugged and forgot all about that strange kid.

His disappointment was so distracting, it took him several moments to become aware of his non-Buffy surroundings.

First, he realized that his shrink ray, thankfully, had shrunk with him. Regrettably, its batteries were completely drained and were now too small to recharge. Any normal-sized power source would cause the entire unit to explode.

Then he heard commotion. Looking down the now-longer hall, he saw students and teachers who were proportional in size to him. They had all shrunk, too.

Somehow, the shrinking field reversed, protecting Buffy while shrinking everyone else -- including anything on their person at the time, such as clothing or backpacks. He suspected the entire building, maybe even the outside grounds also, was affected.

This meant that, in a way, Mark got part of his wish. Almost every girl in school was now tiny. But he couldn’t appreciate it one bit, since they all looked the same from his equally shrunken perspective.

He realized that Buffy had become the most unique student at Sunnydale. She was the only normal-sized person in the entire building. And she didn’t even know it yet.

So just how small was everyone?
15.title: Everyone shrinks -- except Buffy

Search for an alternate power source

154.content:
Half an inch... Embarrassing, really, but it could be a lot worse, Mark reflected. At least he and his fellows were visible to the naked eye! If only they could get Buffy to look down...

But no, the air-head was striding away, heedless of the tiny school populace scurrying for safety around her. How many would she inadvertently crush before she realised what had happened? And could Mark live with himself, knowing that he was responsible for all those deaths?

All he'd really wanted was a simple kidnapping, not a mass slaughter. Eh, perhaps this was karma's way of messing with him for daring to think of a selfish way to utilise one of mankind's greatest inventions...

Bah! He would not allow this to defeat him! He would rise again, and all would tremble before him!

His posturing was undermined somewhat as a fly buzzed overhead, prompting the inventor to yelp and dash for cover.

So, what was the first step, o mighty tyrant? Mark pondered long and hard. Buffy, being the only regular-sized person, was the best hope for safety, but she was also incredibly dangerous to approach, not to mention Mark's crippling fear of any female in a position of power. He couldn't stand it!

Alternatively, he could seek a solution to the power problem; there must be some small enough measure of energy accessible somewhere around Sunnydale High!

Perhaps one of his fellow shrunken victims could provide assistance that e hadn't conceived of? Unlikely, given that his IQ was several orders of magnitude greater than theirs, but he was willing to entertain the chance that one of their typically moronic comments could trigger a eureka moment for him...

155.content:
This was going to be a problem, Mark anticipated. He, and everyone else in the building besides Buffy, was simply indescribably small. A millimetre, at best? Near invisible to the casual, naked eye? A size that Buffy would likely not notice even as she stepped on it?

Scratch that; the barest movement was going to cause havoc. Buffy took a step.

Air currents smashed Mark away from his place, tumbling across the hallway in the girl's wake. This, in addition to the sonic booms of each foot's ground impact was enough to drive all sanity from his mind. He turned his rage upon the device in his hands: work damn you, work!

What would you do, for a way out of your predicament?

Somehow, the voice cut through the chaos around Mark. He had no visual bearing to judge where it was coming from, if it was coming from anywhere at all. Nothing natural could create a sound capable of being heard over current events.

Natural... From a man that has built a shrink ray. Do you see the irony? Can we just skip past the incredulity and get to the part where we make a deal?

It was reading his thoughts, whatever it was. And, given the current situation, there was no way that making a deal could make things worse.

A wise decision. We shall discuss what I desire in return later; a trivial matter, I assure you. What would you ask of me?
155.title: As Dust

choices: Buffy reaches class, and her shrunken friends try to contact her.
Mark has other plans, and sets out on his own.
1551.content:
"Fix this infernal device!" Mark shouted, waving his broken shrink ray around in frustration.

Really? Huh... you know, a smart person would have asked to be normal size. Or to go back in time so they could undo not only this, but me offering them a deal in the first place. Not that it'd work, but it's still something I expected you to try to pull.

Oh well, whatever. No backsies!

The shrink ray in Mark's hands was radiated in an unholy energy. Once it dissipated, the gun hummed back to life.

"Hahaha! Excellent!" Mark pointed the ray to himself. "Now to grow myself back and make that bitch a teensie little..."

The device suddenly grew hot in Mark's hands. With a surprised shout, he dropped it to the ground. Fortunately, it remained unbroken.

Hold it, sparky. We need to discuss my end of the deal.

"Oh no... you want my soul, don't you? Well you can't have it!"

What did I just say about no backsies? And no, I don't need your soul. You're the kind of guy that shrinks women and keeps them as sex toys. You're going to hell anyway. What would getting your soul a few hours earlier accomplish?

"Hours?"

I meant years. And besides, I have a better idea. See, we're big on cruel irony down here. And the Slayer inadvertently killing those she's sworn to protect? It's fantastic. I mean, she almost unknowingly ended twelve lives just walking to her next class already! So close!

"So what would you have me do?"

I need you to go to the middle of Sunnydale, and let the energy flow out of your little device again. Don't worry, I added a function to let you do that on purpose; just push all the buttons at once. Do that, and the rest of Sunnydale will be as small as you.

"I'm the size of a gnat! How am I supposed to..."

You can grow yourself. Just do it out of Buffy's sight. In fact, leave Buffy alone. If she sees you, or anyone she actually recognizes as human in the next twenty four hours, the deal's off and you go back to being the size of a crumb. And I'll... I don't know, teleport you into her shoe or something.

"Disgusting... I didn't want my device used for this."

Well, you should have thought of that before. But hey, I'm reasonable. Once you grow yourself and shrink Sunnydale, stay out of sight. Meanwhile I'll be manipulating events so that the Slayer accidentally kills as many people as possible. Stepping on them, sitting on them... heh, maybe I can get her to eat a few.

Mark shuddered.

Once Sunnydale's a ghost town, I'll make sure she knows what she's done. Then, I'll give you the word, and you can shrink her and do with her what you want.

The shrink ray floated from the ground back into Mark's hands.

Now get to work, champ.
1551.title: Mark wants his machine working again

info.brief_description: A guy with a thing for shrunken women targets Buffy Summers but winds up in big trouble.
info.description:
A Sunnydale High School student has invented a shrink ray, and he wants to use it shrink the hottest girls in school -- starting with Buffy Summers. But things don't go according to plan...


Writers are welcome and encouraged to contribute to the story. Please keep the following in mind:

--This should function as an offbeat, standalone episode of Buffy the Vampire Slayer. Don't do anything that wouldn't appear on a network television show. That means keep it PG-13.

--It takes place sometime during the first three seasons of the show (the high school years), but it begins vague as to precisely when. Feel free to establish a specific time; just be consistent with all preceding chapters. (Ex. If Jenny Calendar has appeared, you can't use Faith.) You can even have it occur off-screen in the middle of an existing episode. The choice is yours.

--Please don't mess with the TV show's continuity.

--Feel free to invent any new characters and let your imagination run wild. Have fun.
